affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
notes:
Total possible damage: 150/200/250/300.
Deals damage every 0.8 seconds.
cmb:
150/150/150/150
15/13/11/9
lore: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
name: ancient_apparition_cold_feet

desc: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.  Lasts 16 seconds.

4
lore: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.
name: ancient_apparition_ice_vortex

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.
notes:
Extra damage is its own instance of damage.
Only works against heroes and creeps.
cmb:
110/120/130/140
50/42/34/26
lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his allies.
name: ancient_apparition_chilling_touch

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
The area of effect is 275 + 50*TimeTraveled, capped at 1000. The freeze area along the path is 275.
Kill will be granted to the source of the damage that triggers the shatter.
The instant kill doesn't work on illusions or Meepo clones.
The HP Freeze prevents most kinds of healing, including the fountain.
The Frostbitten debuff cannot be purged.
attrib:
FROSTBITTEN DURATION: 8/9/10
FROSTBITTEN DAMAGE PER SECOND: 12.5/20/32
SHATTER HEALTH THRESHOLD: 10%/11%/12%
SCEPTER FROSTBITTEN DURATION: 17
cmb:
100/125/150
40
lore: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
name: ancient_apparition_ice_blast

desc: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.
cmb: 1
name: ancient_apparition_ice_blast_release
